title: Sound On: Xi Power Grab, GOP Hopefuls Challenge Dems on Economy
itunes:title: Sound On: Xi Power Grab, GOP Hopefuls Challenge Dems on Economy
description:
Joe spoke with DJ Peterson, President of Longview Global Advisors, on the latest from the Xi Party Congress. He also spoke with Bloomberg Congress Reporter Erik Wasson on midterm elections in the Northeast as GOP hopefuls challenge Democrats on the economy. Plus our panel, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino & Rick Davis, discuss the latest from midterms, Donald Trump's rally schedule, and the outcome from Arizona Governor candidate Kari Lake's latest TV interview. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
